description: A rapidly-growing company that specializes in GIS applications and places a strong emphasis on open-source location technology, is looking for a React/TypeScript Developer. The selected candidate will be responsible for creating scalable, high-performing, secure, and robust software through appropriate architecture, design, and delivery
